td.content: s:74 yr old white male retired presents with severe difficulty reading of 4 weeks duration together with severe poor night vision, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month denies any smoking o:Height 169 cm, Weight 52.3 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, Multifocal Electroretinography (+) Multifocal deficiencies of maculae on ERG a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Multifocal Electroretinography, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

content2.Unmatched: severe poor night vision , severe gradual decrease

td.content: s:patient presents with severe difficulty reading for more than 8 days. he is a 75 YO white m retired. o:Height 169 cm, Weight 52.6 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.
